entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor time to first UI regression: blazorwasmbenchmark #60947
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot #60946
  • Perf regression: ApiCrudGetProductDetails #60945
  • Perf regression: kestrel-encoded-url #60944
  • Proposal: OpenApiOptions with Synchronous Transformer Overloads #60943
  • Login/Out problem with Entra External ID (example BlazorWebAppEntra-.net9). Login succesful, logout with problem #60941

Closed

  • SignalR: Allow shared storage of connection token #60390
  • Perf regression: updates #60928
  • Perf regression: antiforgery-validation #60942
  • Perf regression: httpsys-encoded-url, json #60908

PullRequests

Created

  • pin gha #60948
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Add a new UseKestel API to the WebApplicationFactory #60635
    area-mvc
  • feat: create API to fetch TLS client hello message #60806
    pending-ci-rerun, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Don't log inlined values in SQL unless sensitive data logging is enabled #24539

Updated

  • NullReferenceException when adding migration #33417
    Backlog
  • EF Core concurrency issues when interacting with table that have after triggers. #35728
  • Query/Json: inconsistent behavior around missing required navigations in JSON entities #35751

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HybridWebView not displayed when inside the header of a CollectionView in iOS #28426

Closed

  • Maui 9 support armeabi-v7a ? #28413
  • [MAUI] The APP will become not responded on windows platform on a remote-connected machine after some random operations on the local machine #26055
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [9.0.50] MissingMethodException when using CommunityToolkit.Maui.Views.PopupExtensions.ShowPopupAsync #28402

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] ToolbarItems Tooltip text color #28427
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • CollectionView display is broken when setting IsVisible after items are added - Fix #28425
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Fix: BlankScreenOnNavigationBack on Android #28423
    community ✨

Updated

  • [Mac Catalyst] `NullReferenceException` in `DragAndDropDelegate` - FIX #28417
    platform/macOS 🍏, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [NET10.0] Annotate `ListStringTypeConverter` for nullability #28244
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fixed - Using CollectionView.EmptyView results in an Exception on Windows #28367
    area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] Shell Flyout Header and Footer not respecting safe area in landscape mode #28379
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [iOS] DatePicker | Remove unnecessary UpdateDate() call in UpdateTextColor() #27811
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Testing] Mark BlankScreenOnNavigationBack as flaky on Android #28377
    platform/android 🤖, area-testing
  • SwipeItemView won't render FontImageSource on first opening - fix #25397
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing space formatting in multi-line collection expression #77626

Closed

  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build feature.debugger.main-35914.169 #77629
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35914.26 #77618

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for static extension method completion #77631
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Expand keyword completion in extension scenarios #77630
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Remove specialized GC logic in Roslyn #77628
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change keys for import caching #77627
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Remove old options related to solution crawler #77625
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Correct how we pick up options for `ICopilotOptionsService` #77620
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Extensions: update semantic model APIs #77619
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Merge RoslynAnalyzers into Roslyn #77617
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77622
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77621
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ensure we don't touch Solution.Workspace if we don't have to #77581
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77616
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77615
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete target types that do not use `[CollectionBuilder]` #77477
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Add more modern-extension FAR tests #77503
    Area-IDE, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Relax signature collision rules for static extension methods #77603
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Attempt to further reduce thread switches during package load. #77602
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Incorrect marshalling of Bool return types in new exception handling #113574
  • Implement IRootFunctions for Complex #113569
  • IAsyncEnumerable LINQ and Async context #113567
  • Incorrect comment and maybe missed-optimization in src/coreclr/jit/codegenlinear.cpp for LoongArch & RISC-V #113565
  • IServiceScope.Dispose() and DisposeAsync() should not stop disposing other services if one throws an exception #113563
  • [API Proposal]: ClaimsIdentity to perform case-sensitive comparison #113562
    10.0.0

Closed

  • Bug with ToString() method inheritance in base record class #113570
  • Program incorrectly handles crypto key when running under Linux .NET 9 but is fine under .NET 8 #113555
    Future
  • FreeBSD RIDs started to have the OS major version in it #111900
  • Add support for custom versions of libfuzzer-dotnet in fuzzing #113303
  • IAsyncEnumerable LINQ async context #113566
  • Make System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.LocalizableString effectively public #41505
  • Not Able to Trust the Certificate in the Azure Linux Container App #112485

PullRequests

Created

  • [CI run only] Use funclets and new EH on win-x86 #113576
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Loop cloning for Span #113575
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid infinite loop in recursive type hierarchies #113572
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, 10.0.0
  • LoongArch is a NEW ISA which is different from MIPS #113564
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • JIT: Changes from #113440 with diffs #113559
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Don't call fgMorphBlockStmt in LoopClonning #113558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] test that Task.Yield yields to browser event loop #113531
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Fix compare immediate and branch helper for 2^n #113523
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Handle KilledRegisters more efficiently in LinearScan::processKills() #111004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: enable inlining methods with EH #112998
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] Change default boot config to dotnet.boot.js #113374
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Properly handle param reg targets with multiple register assignments #113499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update llvm-libunwind to 20.1.0 #113513
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Add morphing to LE_UN/GT_UN(expr, uint.MaxValue) (dotnet#76525) #113037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][st] event pipe #110818
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [browser] managed Diagnostics.Metrics and Diagnostics.Tracing single-threaded #113524
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix double dispose of GCHandle in BrowserWebSocket #113541
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, os-browser, 9.0.x
  • [browser] [wasm] Make response streaming opt-out #111680
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, os-browser
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • performance pipelines triggers unified #113556
    perf-pipeline, needs-area-label
  • Use reflection metadata to represent methods/fields in native layout #113413
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change ZipBlocks structs to classes #113453
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [Json] Avoid writing to PipeWriter if IAsyncEnumerable throws before first item #113503
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Allow specifying SDK search paths in global.json #113512
    area-Host
  • Remove redundant nullable annotation #113550
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • Fix AcquireCredentialHandle parameter lifetime #113540
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #113448
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet sln add` not consistently discovering Project Type Guids for unknown project types #47638
  • Discuss the handling of `RunSettingsFilePath` in new dotnet test experience #47636
    10.0.1xx
  • Revise `TryGetProjectOrSolutionFilePath` and `GetSolutionFilePaths` logic for the new dotnet test experience #47635
    10.0.1xx
  • The ToString() method of the StringBuilder class is used in conjunction with $ #47633

Closed

  • [MSTest template] Test runner wording should be VSTest/Microsoft.Testing.Platform rather than VSTest/MSTest #47090
  • [MSTest template] aka link for test runner doesn't seem to be correct #47092

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47634
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: Move command folder sources #47620
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Merged

  • Add validation for command-line arguments related to new dotnet test #47616
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't get produced packages from transitive references in other build passes #47610
    Area-VMR
  • dotnet CLI: Removed .Designer files #47617
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Updated

  • Remove primary vertical concept from JoinVerticals #47338
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Add command 'dotnet project add' #47500
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • Update `dotnet run file.cs` spec with new ignored directives syntax #47543
    untriaged, Area-run-file
